description:
The interview was recorded on June 25, 2004 with Aḥmad Shafīq al-Khaṭīb, male, born in 1926 in al-Qubaybah, Palestine.

السيرة: سجلت المقابلة مع أحمد شفيق الخطيب في 25 حزيران يونيو عام 2004، ذكر، ولد عام 1926 في القبيبة، فلسطين.
contents: Family origins, education, and childhood. (@ 0:07)||Social life, culture, and political conditions. (@ 21:46)||Social and community life. (@ 46:48)||Palestinian-Jewish relations and political life. (@ 71:29)||Zionist Invasion of Palestine, 1948 and battles . (@ 83:27)||Exile to Beirut (Lebanon) and career establishment . (@ 96:40)||Father's death and career. (@ 116:47)
